doc.title: Innocent Adultery
doc.plot: This take on the movie Fatal Attraction was set in the island of Trinidad. The story centers on four white Americans who are in the island for the Carnival festivities. Paul(Robin Sachs), a car designer, has come to finish designing a new car for Robert Amar. He meets a lovely woman named Lana, who seduces him. A series of misunderstandings leads to things becoming really messed up for the four.
